text.title: Incident #2
text.description: We are experiencing an issue with some of our nodes located in Luxenburg causing slow load times throughout our platform. We are trying to get them up and running again as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.

events.title: Incident #2
events.description: We are experiencing an issue with some of our nodes located in Luxenburg. We are trying to get them up and running again as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
